verses.verse: O LORD, <WH3068> thou <WH859> art my God; <WH430> I will exalt <WH7311> thee, I will praise <WH3034> thy name; <WH8034> for <WH3588> thou hast done <WH6213> wonderful <WH6382> things; thy counsels <WH6098> of old <WH4480> <WH7350> are faithfulness <WH530> and truth. <WH544>

For <WH3588> thou hast made <WH7760> of a city <WH4480> <WH5892> a heap; <WH1530> of a defensed <WH1219> city <WH7151> a ruin: <WH4654> a palace <WH759> of strangers <WH2114> to be no city; <WH4480> <WH5892> it shall never <WH3808> <WH5769> be built. <WH1129>
Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> shall the strong <WH5794> people <WH5971> glorify <WH3513> thee, the city <WH7151> of the terrible <WH6184> nations <WH1471> shall fear <WH3372> thee.

For <WH3588> thou hast been <WH1961> a strength <WH4581> to the poor, <WH1800> a strength <WH4581> to the needy <WH34> in his distress, <WH6862> a refuge <WH4268> from the storm, <WH4480> <WH2230> a shadow <WH6738> from the heat, <WH4480> <WH2721> when <WH3588> the blast <WH7307> of the terrible ones <WH6184> is as a storm <WH2230> against the wall. <WH7023>

Thou shalt bring down <WH3665> the noise <WH7588> of strangers, <WH2114> as the heat <WH2721> in a dry place; <WH6724> even the heat <WH2721> with the shadow <WH6738> of a cloud: <WH5645> the branch <WH2159> of the terrible ones <WH6184> shall be brought low. <WH6030>

And in this <WH2088> mountain <WH2022> shall the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> make <WH6213> unto all <WH3605> people <WH5971> a feast <WH4960> of fat things, <WH8081> a feast <WH4960> of wines on the lees, <WH8105> of fat things <WH8081> full of marrow, <WH4229> of wines on the lees <WH8105> well refined. <WH2212>

And he will destroy <WH1104> in this <WH2088> mountain <WH2022> the face <WH6440> of the covering <WH3875> cast <WH3874> over <WH5921> all <WH3605> people, <WH5971> and the veil <WH4541> that is spread <WH5259> over <WH5921> all <WH3605> nations. <WH1471>

He will swallow up <WH1104> death <WH4194> in victory; <WH5331> and the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069> will wipe away <WH4229> tears <WH1832> from off <WH4480> <WH5921> all <WH3605> faces; <WH6440> and the rebuke <WH2781> of his people <WH5971> shall he take away <WH5493> from off <WH4480> <WH5921> all <WH3605> the earth: <WH776> for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> hath spoken <WH1696> it.

And it shall be said <WH559> in that <WH1931> day, <WH3117> Lo, <WH2009> this <WH2088> is our God; <WH430> we have waited <WH6960> for him, and he will save <WH3467> us: this <WH2088> is the LORD; <WH3068> we have waited <WH6960> for him, we will be glad <WH1523> and rejoice <WH8055> in his salvation. <WH3444>

For <WH3588> in this <WH2088> mountain <WH2022> shall the hand <WH3027> of the LORD <WH3068> rest, <WH5117> and Moab <WH4124> shall be trodden down <WH1758> under <WH8478> him, even as straw <WH4963> is trodden down <WH1758> for the dunghill. <WH4087>

And he shall spread forth <WH6566> his hands <WH3027> in the midst <WH7130> of them, as <WH834> he that swimmeth <WH7811> spreadeth forth <WH6566> his hands to swim: <WH7811> and he shall bring down <WH8213> their pride <WH1346> together with <WH5973> the spoils <WH698> of their hands. <WH3027>
And the fortress <WH4013> of the high fort <WH4869> of thy walls <WH2346> shall he bring down, <WH7817> lay low, <WH8213> and bring <WH5060> to the ground, <WH776> even to <WH5704> the dust. <WH6083>
